dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5155 IH: To prohibit the National Endowment for the Humanities to provide funds to carry out the Popular Romance Project or any similar project relating to love or romance.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To prohibit the National Endowment for the Humanities to provide funds to carry out the Popular Romance Project or any similar project relating to love or romance.

section.text: The National Endowment for the Humanities may not provide funds to carry out the Popular Romance Project or any similar project relating to love or romance.
